text: hi I'm Skyler I'm nine and this is a
story of the time I made breakfast and
bed for my mom my mom does so much for
my family my two sisters my dad and me
her birthday was coming up and I wanted
to do something that she would never
forget my mom always told me that the
best birthday presents are the ones that
you make yourself and then it hit me
I'll make breakfast and bed for my mom
my dad and I went to the store and got
the things my mom likes her favorite
cereal fruit and Juice I made cereal and
put berries in it and then I poured a
glass of juice my dad helped me make
toast and I spread the jam on it and
then I brought it to my mom she was so
surprised and so happy she said it was
the best birthday present ever and that
made me happy we even shared the toast
I'll make breakfast and bed for my mom
again because it was so fun and she
deserves
it you just watched a TTI on Disney
Channel
